title: This Apple Watch charger is half the price of Apple’s… and it’s portable!
content:
Macworld

Apple Watches are known for many things, but battery life is not one of them. You can charge your device overnight or during the day, but either way, you seem to be missing out on some of the robust features. I like to use my Apple Watch both for my morning workouts and to track my sleep, but the battery life makes that nearly impossible. This Apple Watch Wireless Charger is just $14.97 and can be thrown in a purse or easily clipped to any backpack or keyring.

This charger works for all Apple Watch series. It can charge Series 4 and 5 Apple Watches once, Series 3 and 2 watches twice, and Series 1 watches can be charged 3 times. You can also kill two birds with one stone by charging your watch and the charger simultaneously so both have maximum power when you’re out of the house.
